hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: FORCE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Force to update zip files to nfs share, even there are already one available.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
branch=FBLRC1613 DSPrev=$(egrep 'Last Changed Rev:' "$branch"_dsp_revision_info.txt | sed 's:[^0-9]::g') || exit 1
echo "DSPrev=${DSPrev}" > enb.txt
#Add CCS_RT libs to nfs share and update MCU_ECL CCS_RT_VERSION=$(svn info --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/FBLRC1613/trunk/C_Platform/CCS_RT -r $DSPrev | sed -n "s#Last Changed Rev: \([0-9]*\)#\1#p") IFUPCCS_VERSION=$(svn info --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/FBLRC1613/trunk/I_Interface/Platform_Env/CCS_ENV -r $DSPrev | sed -n "s#Last Changed Rev: \([0-9]*\)#\1#p") if [ ! -n "$CCS_RT_VERSION" ] || [ ! -n "$IFUPCCS_VERSION" ]; then echo "CCS_RT_VERSION=$CCS_RT_VERSION or IFUPCCS_VERSION=$IFUPCCS_VERSION is not exist" exit 1 fi rm -fr ECL_MCU mkdir ECL_MCU #svn co $SVN_COMMAND https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_MCUHWAPI/FBLRC1613/trunk/ECL ECL_MCU
if [ -e MCU_trunk_git ];then cd MCU_trunk_git git fetch --all git reset --hard origin/master cd .. else git clone ssh://`whoami`@gerrite1.ext.net.nokia.com:8282/LRC_MCUHWAPI_FBLRC1613 MCU_trunk_git fi rsync -avz MCU_trunk_git/ECL/ECL ECL_MCU/ECL
rm -fr ECL_DSP svn co $SVN_COMMAND https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/FBLRC1613/trunk/ECL -r $DSPrev ECL_DSP
#original #MCU_ECL_CCS_RT=$(sed -n "s#ECL_CCS_RT=.*@\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL) #MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL) #MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_FEP_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_FEP_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL)
#DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_DSP/ECL) #DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_DSP/ECL) #DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_FEP_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_FEP_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_DSP/ECL)
#modified MCU_ECL_CCS_RT=$(sed -n "s#ECL_CCS_RT=.*@\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL) MCU_ECL_IFUPCCS=$(sed -n "s#ECL_IFUPCCS=.*@\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL) MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_MCU/ECL)
if [ ! -n "$MCU_ECL_CCS_RT" ] || [ ! -n "$MCU_ECL_IFUPCCS" ] || [ ! -n "$MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" ]; then echo "MCU_ECL_CCS_RT=$MCU_ECL_CCS_RT or MCU_ECL_IFUPCCS=$MCU_ECL_IFUPCCS or MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL is not exist" exit 1 fi
DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_DSP/ECL) DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=$(sed -n "s#ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=\([0-9]*\)#\1#p" ECL_DSP/ECL)
if [ ! -n "$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" ] || [ ! -n "$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS" ]; then echo "DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL or DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS is not exist" exit 1 fi
#Check if any of following are changed: #ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL #ECL_IFCCS #CCS_RT_VERSION
if [ "$IFUPCCS_VERSION" != "$MCU_ECL_IFUPCCS" ] || [ "$CCS_RT_VERSION" != "$MCU_ECL_CCS_RT" ] || [ "$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" != "$MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" ]; then #if [ "$CCS_RT_VERSION" != "$MCU_ECL_CCS_RT" ] || [ "$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" != "$MCU_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL" ]; then echo "Update MCU ECL as current ECL_CCS_RT is $ECL_CCS_RT and new revisin is $CCS_RT_VERSION" sed -i "s#\(ECL_IFUPCCS=.*@\).*#\1$IFUPCCS_VERSION#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_IFUPCCS=.*LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/\).*\(/trunk.*@\).*#\1FBLRC1613\2$IFUPCCS_VERSION#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_CCS_RT=.*@\).*#\1$CCS_RT_VERSION#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_CCS_RT=.*LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/\).*\(/trunk.*@\).*#\1FBLRC1613\2$CCS_RT_VERSION#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL=\).*#\1$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_REL#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS=\).*#\1$DSP_ECL_PS_LRC_LSP_LFS_OS#" ECL_MCU/ECL sed -i "s#\(ECL_CCS_RT_LIBS=DSP_LIBS_\).*#\1${DSPrev}.zip#" ECL_MCU/ECL if [ -e MCU_trunk_git ];then cd MCU_trunk_git git fetch --all git reset --hard origin/master cd .. else git clone ssh://`whoami`@gerrite1.ext.net.nokia.com:8282/LRC_MCUHWAPI_FBLRC1613 MCU_trunk_git fi cat ECL_MCU/ECL > MCU_trunk_git/ECL/ECL cd MCU_trunk_git git diff HEAD > ../ecl_diff.txt git add ECL/ECL echo "DSP_Build_RT_FBLRC1613 update following ECL entries:" > commit_msg.txt echo "Changed components: " >> commit_msg.txt grep -E "[-+]ECL" ../ecl_diff.txt >> commit_msg.txt git commit -F commit_msg.txt git push origin master:master || { echo "push ECL to master failed "; exit 1; } #svn up $SVN_COMMAND_NOFORCE ECL_MCU #svn ci $SVN_COMMAND_NOFORCE ECL_MCU -F commit_msg.txt MCUrev=$(git rev-parse master) echo "SCMPRELOGOUT: ${DSPrev}->${MCUrev}" fi
echo http://10.140.19.16/jobs/$JOB_NAME/builds/$BUILD_NUMBER/log > logurl.txt
